Comment: In Feb the Atlanta Fed predicted first quarter GDP of +2.9%.  Then Trump started talking about the tariffs  and within a couple of weeks the Fed predicted NEGATIVE first quarter GDP.  What happened?  Consumer confidence plunged.  Fearing a recession consumers cut their spending.  About 3/4 of the GDP is based on consumer spending.  The latest forecast from the Atlanta Fed estimates the second quarter GDP will be -2.7%  We are headed to a major recession, it is all on Trump.  Trump's Great Recession is going to be very bad..
